title: IT & Digitalisation (Apprenticeship)
missions: Lots of things related to IT & Digital

title: Developper (Apprenticeship)
description: Working in a startup is very rewarding, you get to work on so many different things! Learned a lot during this apprenticeship, some technical and non-technical skills. Graaly creates a mobile app that allows you to create an escape game anywhere : at home, at work, public places and in a very simple way !
missions: Transforming a NodeJs Api into an AWS Lambda API
Creating IOT objects that communicate with the App using Bluetooth
Creating a complete management platform for real time view of the players progress
Project management with training of interns

title: Developper
description: This was my first "real" job! Learned a new game engine and how to create touch screen optimized interfaces. Moovlab makes a connected bracelet that is linked to a video game that allows you to do sports while having fun!
missions: Creation of a touch based interface for selecting video games

title: Electronics developper (Internship)
description: Working with Arduino is easy, working with bare metal microcontrollers is abit more complicated. The goal of the internship was simulating sensors with STM32 Nucleo cards, including address allocation, registers, SPI protocol, quite a challenge.
missions: Creating a simulation of real sensors inside drones
Recreating the memory allocation of different sensors

title: Mobile App Developper (Internship)
description: This was my first working experience, 4 months working with the Microsoft stack to create a mobile App allowing camping owners to be kept up to date on their new bookings. Alliance Reseau creates a backend service that allows campings, hotels, and other establishments to integrate payment into their website.
missions: Creating a mobile App with Xamarin
Integrating the application with webhooks in the existing API

title: Your company in this list ? Let's Chat About It !
description: I am always looking for oportunities, lets chat about it !
